verses.text: \w After|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* drought,\f + \fr 18:1 \ft Literally And the days were many, and in the third year,\f* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah: “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H5414"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Ahab, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.”

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* Elijah \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* present himself \w to|strong="H3212"\w* Ahab. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w was|strong="H7458"\w* \w severe|strong="H2389"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* Ahab \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*. (\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w feared|strong="H3373"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* Jezebel \w had|strong="H3068"\w* slaughtered \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2244"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w*, \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w* per \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, providing \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.)

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* Ahab said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*. Perhaps \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w keep|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w mules|strong="H6505"\w* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3772"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* livestock.”

\w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* land \w to|strong="H1980"\w* explore. Ahab \w went|strong="H1980"\w* one \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* himself, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* other \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* himself.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w went|strong="H7125"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, Elijah \w suddenly|strong="H2009"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w recognized|strong="H5234"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* said, “\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord Elijah?”

“\w It|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w he|strong="H2009"\w* answered. “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* tell \w your|strong="H2009"\w* master, ‘Elijah \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*!’”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Obadiah replied, “\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w handing|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Ahab \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*?

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* someone \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* said, ‘\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w here|strong="H8033"\w*,’ \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w made|strong="H7650"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* say, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* tell \w your|strong="H6258"\w* master \w that|strong="H2009"\w* Elijah \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*!’

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* leave \w you|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* Ahab \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w*, \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

\w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* Jezebel slaughtered \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* per \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w provided|strong="H3557"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* say, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* tell \w your|strong="H2026"\w* lord \w that|strong="H2009"\w* Elijah \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*!’ \w He|strong="H2009"\w* will \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H2026"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* Elijah said, “\w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H5975"\w* myself \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Ahab \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.” Elijah on Mount Carmel

So \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w inform|strong="H5046"\w* Ahab, who \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* Elijah.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* Ahab \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* Elijah, \w he|strong="H3478"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w troubler|strong="H5916"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?”

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w troubled|strong="H5916"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,” Elijah replied, “\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* father’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* summon \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w meet|strong="H6908"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, along \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Asherah \w who|strong="H3605"\w* eat \w at|strong="H3478"\w* Jezebel’s \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* Ahab summoned \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Elijah \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, “\w How|strong="H4970"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* waver \w between|strong="H5704"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w opinions|strong="H5587"\w*? If \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w did|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* Elijah said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* only \w remaining|strong="H3498"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3498"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* prophets \w of|strong="H6086"\w* Baal choose \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w*, \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w*, \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire. \w And|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w other|strong="H8147"\w* \w bull|strong="H6499"\w* \w and|strong="H6086"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w light|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w answers|strong="H6030"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w What|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.”
